text.title: Abadeh
text.head: Abadeh
text.p: Abadeh is a city in the Fars province of Iran.
text.head: Get in
text.p: By Bus or Car as Abadeh is located on the main road of Isfahan-Shiraz.
text.head: Get around
See
text.p: Abadeh historical monuments include Emirate Kolah Farangi, Tymcheh Sarafyan and Khaje tomb, located in the Khoja mountains.
text.head: Do
Buy
text.p: Famous carved wood-work, made of the wood of pear and box trees.
Sesame oil, castor oil, grain, and various fruits
Abadeh crafts can be embroidered in cotton. The town also produces Abadeh rugs.
